rules.title: Trading Rules

items.title: Maximum Drawdown
items.description: Your account cannot exceed a 10% maximum drawdown from the initial balance. Once reached, the account is breached.

items.title: Daily Drawdown
items.description: Daily losses are limited to 5% of the account balance. This resets at 5 PM EST daily.

items.title: Position Limits
items.description: Maximum 5% of account equity per position. Maximum 20% exposure across all positions.

items.title: Profit Target
items.description: Achieve the specified profit target within the challenge period to qualify for funding.

items.title: Trading Days
items.description: Minimum trading days required. Day count includes any day with a trade executed.

items.title: EA & Automation

items.title: News Trading

items.title: Phase 2 Trading

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our funded trading program

general.a: A proprietary trading firm provides capital to traders to trade in financial markets. Traders don't use their own money but split profits with the firm based on agreed terms.
We evaluate traders through our challenge program. Traders who pass our evaluation criteria receive funded accounts and can keep up to 80% of their profits.

general.q: Is there any risk to me?
general.a: You risk only the challenge fee you pay. You never risk your personal capital since you trade with our firm's capital.

challenges.q: What happens if I fail the challenge?
challenges.a: If you fail the challenge, you can purchase another challenge at any time. Many traders succeed on their second or third attempt after learning from their experience.

challenges.q: Can I use automated trading systems?
challenges.a: Yes, EAs and automated trading systems are allowed. However, they must be submitted for verification before use in live trading.

challenges.q: How long does the challenge take?
challenges.a: The Standard challenge has no time limit. The Express challenge must be completed within 14 days. You can finish faster if you hit your targets early.

funding.a: You can request your first payout 14 days after receiving your funded account. Subsequent payouts can be requested at any time with a 48-hour processing period.
We offer an industry-leading 80% profit split to our traders. This means you keep 80% of all profits you generate.

funding.q: How can I scale my account?
funding.a: Accounts are evaluated every 4 weeks. If you maintain profitability and follow all rules, your account can be scaled up by 25-50% each evaluation period.

trading.a: We offer trading on Forex, Indices, Commodities, and Cryptocurrencies. Full list of available instruments is provided in your trading platform.
Trading is available 24/5 during market hours. Some instruments may have specific trading sessions which are documented in our trading rules.

trading.q: Can I trade during news events?
trading.a: Yes, trading during high-impact news events is permitted. However, we strongly advise against it due to increased volatility and slippage risk.

account.q: How do I reset my password?
account.a: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You'll receive a password reset link at your registered email address.
